details: Collaborated with NSF Proto-OKN Theme 3: An Education Gateway for the Proto-OKN - EduGate project.
Designed an optimized Curriculum Knowledge Graph for Knowledge Graph Education.
Developed and deployed scalable AI models and knowledge-driven systems on HPC clusters.
Led cross-institutional collaborations contributing to Neurosymbolic AI and Knowledge Representation.
Enhanced AI-driven K-12 STEM learning technologies through the NSF National AI Institute for Inclusive Intelligent Technologies for Education - INVITE Institute project.
Optimized research through AI techniques, including systematic reviews & crafting academic research findings.
Coauthored journal articles and conference proceedings on AI applications in education.
Designed and optimized a modular network architecture, improving API request efficiency by 50%.
Developed and integrated cloud-based backend services with secure API communications and real-time synchronization.
Conducted legacy system refactoring and end-to-end iOS development, improving scalability and performance.
Led a team of 5 in creating BXT Agile and Design Thinking business pitches.
Developed innovative iOS healthcare applications, earning multiple awards for performance.
Enhanced operational efficiency by optimizing workflows leveraging Python, PySpark, SQL, and Microsoft Azure Technologies.
Successfully delivered a cross-platform mobile application for a leading real estate client, securing a multi-million-dollar contract.
Architected and created mobile app clients and server services.
Developed a robust social media mobile app enabling content publishing and real-time messaging.
Engineered APIs with ASP.NET Core, facilitating efficient data communication and system performance.
